readability_reflection: Looking at the spacing in the variable declarations is what helped me.
comprehension_debugging: Yes because I would get confused if looking at the string syntax and the constant variables, trying to see which variable is which was confusing at first.
preference_rationale: I prefer using string interpolation due to the more simpler way of writing the strings.
learning_curve: My prior familiarity came impact my ease of understanding the code samples by breaking down each section and separating them by block. It was easier to digest the different parts of the code examples.
suggestions_improvement: Readability can possibly be improved by declaring the string beforehand and outputting the strings in each little block or sections.
